H0.text: What was the name of two tyrants who ruled Syracuse in the 2nd century BC. Agathocles

H1.text: What was the name of two tyrants who ruled Syracuse in the 2nd century BC. Hiero

H2.text: What was the name of two tyrants who ruled Syracuse in the 2nd century BC. Pyrrhus

H3.text: What was the name of two tyrants who ruled Syracuse in the 2nd century BC. Dionisis

A4.text: Agathocles of Syracuse was a tyrant from 317 BC and king of much of Sicily from 304 BC until his death.

A5.text: Hiero II was the Greek tyrant of Syracuse from 275 to 215 BC.

A6.text: Agathocles was the late tyrant of Syracuse, whose mercenaries the Mamertines had seized Messina from.
